name: Idol K-atcher
description:
Idol K-atcher is a location-based smartphone game where you play as a talent agent working for the most famous K-pop entertainment company in the world. Your job is to "catch" as many K-pop idols as you can and bring them into your company by searching for idols around your own environment, playing popular Korean party games and battling other idols in a talent showdown! 

Programmers: Wen Chen, Liliana Rojas, Jonas Gutierrez

Artists: Adam Tangonan, Jennifer Silva
